title: shrI madurApuri
sahitya:
shrI madurApuri vihAriNi shrI rAjamAtangi mAm pAhi


anupallavi

 pAmara jana pAlini kAma dahana mOhini nAma rUpa vimarshini naTEshvari jagajjanani


caraNam   pANDya rAja pUjitAbja pada yugaLE ODyANa pITha sthita sakala kalE pATalIkusuma 
priyE padma rAga samaprabhE sOmasundarEshvara priyE guruguha samudbhavE
